Headline: Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier signal problem near Roosevelt. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier signal problem near Roosevelt.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
